title: IBC rescued 3,171 distressed companies in eight years: Sitharaman
description: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Thursday said the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code (IBC) has rescued 3,171 distressed companies and assisted in the shutdown of unviable firms since its introduction eight years ago. This is a marked improvement from the resolution of stress in less than 3,500 firms under the erstwhile Board of Industrial and Financial Reconstruction (BIFR) regime in 30 years, she said, pitching the IBC as a landmark piece of legislation.
